name: You're Gonna Go Far, Kid
wikiSummary: "You're Gonna Go Far, Kid" is a punk rock song by The Offspring. It is the third track on the band's eighth studio album Rise and Fall, Rage and Grace (2008) and was released as the second single off of the album on September 4, 2008. The song peaked at #1 on the Hot Modern Rock Tracks chart. The song stayed at number one for 11 weeks, making it the longest consecutive run for any Offspring single at #1 and therefore one of the most commercially successful singles released by the band. It also reached #1 on KROQ's Top 106.7 songs of 2008 countdown list.
wikiText:
"You're Gonna Go Far, Kid" is a punk rock song by The Offspring. It is the third track on the band's eighth studio album Rise and Fall, Rage and Grace (2008) and was released as the second single off of the album on September 4, 2008. The song peaked at #1 on the Hot Modern Rock Tracks chart. The song stayed at number one for 11 weeks, making it the longest consecutive run for any Offspring single at #1 and therefore one of the most commercially successful singles released by the band. It also reached #1 on KROQ's Top 106.7 songs of 2008 countdown list.
